title: Fanficion: Spaceman Spiff saves Keen from the metal planet
content:
I love both Spaceman Spiff (made by Bill Watterson) and Commander Keen!(copyright ID software and Apogee soft ware)

Chapter one: How it happened

Keen Has been kidnapped by the Metalians!!! They come from a planet called Metal. Metal is a planet made of all transition metals.

Calvin Spiff, an 7 year old boy, had got a call on his zoponizer fizer saying "Help! I*zzt*am trapped*bzz*on planet Met*zrk*al! Sa*krzp*ve Me!*zot*"

Calvin changed into his space sute, and tranformed into Spaceman Spiff, brave space explorer!!!!

Spiff jumped into his red spaceship and blasted away to planet metal!

Find out what happens in chapter two!Signed, Harvey Smith
A proud member of the beta testing society
"I help entertain!" -Harvey

title: Re: Fanficion: Spaceman Spiff saves Keen from the metal plan
content:
Compare:

[quote]Quote:[hr]Chapter 1: Hungry

Some guy named Steve is really hungry, so he goes looking for cheese in the fridge.
He sees some sausage, but he really likes cheese, so he keeps looking.
There is something moldy in the fridge.

Find out what happens next in chapter 2![hr][/quote]

Then again I suspect somehow what I meant to show with this post, won't be understood.
I'll let somebody else try.[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img]
